job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Do you want to work at the forefront of the changes in the financial services industry and develop central Artificial Intelligence (AI) platform? Then we have a challenging position for you! The ML & AI enablement team at ABN AMRO is looking for an AI Platform Engineer with an innovative mindset, feel for business and engineering drive. You'll be part of a multidisciplinary team to build robust and scalable solutions for business needs. We are looking for creative and passionate people with a "go get it" mentality. You will have the opportunity to work in a highly skilled environment where you get to design, build and integrate cutting edge infrastructure solutions.

Your job

     * Designing, building, testing the infrastructure of a central AI Platform on Azure using the latest AI and GenAI capabilities.
     * Designing, improving and maintaining CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps.
     * Ensuring the reliability of the existing environments.
     * Ensuring a seamless operation and deployment of Azure AI services.
     * Integrating various tools and technologies in the DevOps toolchain to accelerate Data Science teams' use cases from development to real world applications.
     * Identifying industry best practices and assessing the feasibility and benefits of implementing such practices.
     * Collaborating with various team members and teams to test and develop infrastructure to realize business requirements for AI services.
     * Monitoring the usage, availability, health of the systems and products.
job_details.full_text:
AI Platform Engineer

Do you want to work at the forefront of the changes in the financial services industry and develop central Artificial Intelligence (AI) platform? Then we have a challenging position for you! The ML & AI enablement team at ABN AMRO is looking for an AI Platform Engineer with an innovative mindset, feel for business and engineering drive. You'll be part of a multidisciplinary team to build robust and scalable solutions for business needs. We are looking for creative and passionate people with a "go get it" mentality. You will have the opportunity to work in a highly skilled environment where you get to design, build and integrate cutting edge infrastructure solutions.

Your job

     * Designing, building, testing the infrastructure of a central AI Platform on Azure using the latest AI and GenAI capabilities.
     * Designing, improving and maintaining CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps.
     * Ensuring the reliability of the existing environments.
     * Ensuring a seamless operation and deployment of Azure AI services.
     * Integrating various tools and technologies in the DevOps toolchain to accelerate Data Science teams' use cases from development to real world applications.
     * Identifying industry best practices and assessing the feasibility and benefits of implementing such practices.
     * Collaborating with various team members and teams to test and develop infrastructure to realize business requirements for AI services.
     * Monitoring the usage, availability, health of the systems and products.

profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes building and maintaining infrastructure for AI/GenAI capabilities on Azure, including CI/CD pipelines and ensuring reliability and seamless deployment of Azure AI services. While it mentions GenAI capabilities, the core focus is on the platform engineering and MLOps aspects rather than direct model development or application building using generative models.

job_tasks.task_name: Designing, building, testing the infrastructure of a central AI Platform on Azure using the latest AI and GenAI capabilities.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the creation and maintenance of the underlying infrastructure for AI and GenAI, which is a core component of MLOps.

job_tasks.task_name: Designing, improving and maintaining CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps.
job_tasks.justification: CI/CD pipelines are a fundamental part of MLOps, enabling automated testing, deployment, and management of AI systems.

job_tasks.task_name: Ensuring the reliability of the existing environments.
job_tasks.justification: Reliability and maintenance of production environments are key responsibilities within MLOps.

job_tasks.task_name: Ensuring a seamless operation and deployment of Azure AI services.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the operational aspect of managing and deploying AI services, a central theme in MLOps.

job_tasks.task_name: Integrating various tools and technologies in the DevOps toolchain to accelerate Data Science teams' use cases from development to real world applications.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of tools within a DevOps framework to facilitate the end-to-end lifecycle of AI/ML projects, which falls under MLOps.

job_tasks.task_name: Identifying industry best practices and assessing the feasibility and benefits of implementing such practices.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding the broader landscape of AI/ML practices and evaluating their applicability to the business context.

job_tasks.task_name: Collaborating with various team members and teams to test and develop infrastructure to realize business requirements for AI services.
job_tasks.justification: While focused on infrastructure, the collaboration to 'develop infrastructure' and 'realize business requirements' touches upon software development principles for building functional systems.

job_tasks.task_name: Monitoring the usage, availability, health of the systems and products.
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring system performance, availability, and health is a critical aspect of production operations and MLOps.

soft_skills.skill: design, build and integrate cutting edge infrastructure solutions
Collaborating with various team members and teams
